text: @realDonaldTrump What is wrong with this man?  Why is he trying to tear this country apart?  A President is supposed to pull it together.  I am so sad to see how easy it is for him to attempt to create a 2nd Civil War.  Covid-19 needs but 1 more victim, please! And hurry!
